decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the first floor side elevations of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.&nbsp;<br></p><div><br></div>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>Site Location Plan; 1262-PL000-01 P1 - Existing Location [Block] Plan; 1262-PL000-02 P2 - Proposed Location [Block] Plan (received 05.08.24); 1262-PL100-01 P1 - Existing Floor Plans; 1262-PL100-02 P1 - Existing Floor Plans; 1262-PL101-01 P2 - Proposed Floor Plans (received 05.08.24); 1262-PL101-02 P3 - Proposed Floor Plans (received 05.08.24); 1262-PL200-01 P1 - Existing Elevations; 1262-PL200-02 P1 - Existing Elevations; 1262-PL201-01 P3 – Proposed Elevations (received 05.08.24); 1262-PL201-02 P3 – Proposed Elevations (received 05.08.24); 1262-PL201-03 P3 – Proposed Section (received 05.08.24); Design and Access Statement [Partially Superseded]; Fire Safety - Reasonable Exemption Statement</p><p>All plans received 05.07.24 unless otherwise stated</p><div><br></div>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey front extension incorporating porch; single and two storey rear extension; first floor rear extension; conversion of garage to habitable room; outbuilding at rear; external alterations [AMENDED SCHEME]
